channel.title: Ratheronfire's Assorted Collection of Odd Projects
channel.description: Hello there! At some point I'll fill this page out properly probably.

item.title: Created the site.
item.description: Migrated from a self-hosted server to Neocities, with the old server being used to house some projects ill-suited for Neocities.

item.title: Added guestbook and links.
item.description: Added some more social media links and a guestbook because that's what you do in 2023.

item.title: Rewrote site using Hugo.
item.description: Rewrote the site using Hugo. After all, what's the point of hosting a website except to massively over-complcate the whole process?

item.title: GRAFALD
item.description: GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD GRAFALD

item.title: New RSS Feed
item.description: I've decided to start running an RSS feed for the occasional updates I'll make to this site.

item.title: Added Reviews
item.description: Added a new section for reviews. At the moment they're just copied directly from my Letterboxd/Backloggd/whatnot profiles, but I'd like to do stuff tailored towards the site in the future as well.

item.title: OldSchool RuneScape - My Time With Leagues IV
item.description: A progress log and some thoughts on my time with Leagues IV in OldSchool RuneScape.
